Title: Dice & Paper Game Assistant
Description: This application will integrate live voice, webcam and chat feeds with character sheet management and dice rolling/combat management screens.  The app will be built using WPF, WCF, SQL Server Compact Edition (with Sync Services) and possibly with DirectX or Live Services.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This application will integrate live voice, webcam and chat feeds with character sheet management and dice rolling/combat management screens. The app will be built using WPF, WCF, SQL Server Compact Edition (with Sync Services) and possibly with DirectX or Live Services.

Ozziemedes Blog outlines most of what's going on with this project.
